name: Hypersonic Shark
text: If you control a WATER Xyz monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can shuffle this card into your Deck; Special Summon 1 "Shark" monster from your Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Hypersonic Shark" once per turn. If this card is used for the Xyz Summon of a WATER monster, it can be treated as a Level 4 or 5 monster.
